MetaStan R package
===============

`MetaStan` is an R package for Meta-Analysis using Stan.


Building
--------
`MetaStan` package is not available on CRAN, yet. `MetaStan` can be installed using `devtools` package as follows:

```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("gunhanb/MetaStan")
```


Testing
-------

The `testthat` package is used for testing. Tests reside in the
`tests/testthat` directory.
